docs.snippet: Buenos Aires is the hub of opposition to the. United States on this continent. Prejudice-which seldom becomes actual hostility individually but often develops into suspicion of "North" Americans collectively-is to be found, in some form or other, all...
docs.lead_paragraph: Buenos Aires is the hub of opposition to the. United States on this continent. Prejudice-which seldom becomes actual hostility individually but often develops into suspicion of "North" Americans collectively-is to be found, in some form or other, all over Latin America, even in essentially proAmerican Brazil.

docs.snippet: Bonds continued to drift irregularly lower yesterday in fairly active trading on the New York Stock Exchange. All major groups participated in the decline, which forced the combined price average for the corporate section down 0.17 point, and the...
docs.lead_paragraph: Bonds continued to drift irregularly lower yesterday in fairly active trading on the New York Stock Exchange. All major groups participated in the decline, which forced the combined price average for the corporate section down 0.17 point, and the foreign list down 0.12.
